= Project Roadmap =

Here is our vision of the project.
We have some ideas of what is possible to do, but you can tell us what you need inside.
Please start a topic on the [http://groups.google.com/group/gwt-mvc google group] for new features, or start an [http://code.google.com/p/gwt-mvc/issues/list issue].
